text:
Linking your Discord
and PlayStation accounts
will allow you to share
what PlayStation games you are playing
by showing them in your status.

As of now, this is the
only feature of Discord
available on PlayStation.
To get started,

open the Discord app on
your computer or phone
and open the settings menu.

Under "USER SETTINGS,"
select "Connections."
A menu will display a variety of services
that are compatible with Discord.
Select the PlayStation icon in this list.
You'll be transferred to a browser
to enter your PlayStation credentials
to confirm linking the two services.

Enter a two-factor
authentication code if requested
and click "Accept" to confirm the terms
to link the two accounts.

Now whenever you launch a
game on your PS4 or PS5,
your Discord status should update
to share it with your network.
If you wish to turn this off
and change whether your PSN user
is shared on your Discord profile,

navigate back to "Connections"
and make the desired changes.
